mapper.select: SELECT a.branch_no, left(b.item_clsno, convert(int, '2')) as item_clsno, c.item_clsname, sum(a.sale_qty) as sale_qty, sum(a.sale_ramount) as sale_amt, sum(a.ret_qty) as ret_qty, sum(a.ret_ramount) as ret_amt, sum(a.give_qty) as give_qty, sum(a.sale_qty - a.ret_qty + a.give_qty) as sale_rqty, sum(a.sale_ramount - a.ret_ramount) as sale_ramt FROM pos_t_daysum_item a, view_item_info b, view_item_clsno_info c WHERE a.item_no = b.item_no and left(b.item_clsno, convert(int, '2')) = c.item_clsno AND (len(b.item_clsno) >= convert(int, '2') OR b.item_clsno = '00') AND (a.oper_date = #{optDate}) AND (a.branch_no in(#{branchNo})) GROUP by a.branch_no, left(b.item_clsno, convert(int, '2')), c.item_clsname ORDER by 2
